column3: I see the weapon system worked well?

column4: but it seems a bit weak.

column3: I've reopened my ^05garage^00 right next to me! You could buy better gear.
If you beat my highscore of 00:45 seconds on the track
column4: I have a special gift for you.

column3: And my radar picked up the two remaining ^04satellite pieces^00. I've uploaded the coordinates.
Use your map! And report back when you've found them. I am still working on that ^02tractor beam^00.
OK. Beat your race-highscore of 00:45. Upgrade weapons in your ^05garage^00. Find two more ^04pieces^00.
